name: NPRGNC_RT_PRST_2
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field NEPHROGENIC RESTS PRESENT.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NPRGNC_RT_PRST_2_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Nephrogenic rests present.
